alert.note: Alert for Bon Homme; Brule; Charles Mix; Gregory; Yankton (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 08 at 6:48AM MDT until September 08 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE MISSOURI RIVER VALLEY... * AFFECTED AREA...In South Dakota, Gregory, Brule, Charles Mix, Bon Homme and Yankton. * WINDS...Southwest 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph...northwest to west winds up to 30 mph after 3pm. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 15 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Bon Homme; Brule; Charles Mix; Gregory; Yankton
